parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. If unset, the version will be defaulted to 16.4.3. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

select_pool.description: Indicates pool or pool-group selection on rule match. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

begin.description: Starting IP address of the range.

end.description: Ending IP address of the range.

group_refs.description: UUID of IP address group(s). It is a reference to an object of type IpAddrGroup.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for IP address matching the HTTP request. Enum options - IS_IN, IS_NOT_IN.

start.description: TCP/UDP port range start (inclusive). Allowed values are 1-65535.

end.description: TCP/UDP port range end (inclusive). Allowed values are 1-65535.

ip_addr.description: Placeholder for description of property ip_addr of obj type IpAddrPrefix field type str  type object

client_ip.description: IP addresses to match against client IP. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

protocol.description: TCP/UDP/ICMP protocol to match against transport protocol. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

port.description: Port number to match against Virtual Service listner port. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

pool_ref.description: ID of the pool of servers to serve the request. It is a reference to an object of type Pool. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

action_type.description: Indicates action to take on rule match. Enum options - L4_RULE_ACTION_SELECT_POOL, L4_RULE_ACTION_SELECT_POOLGROUP. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

pool_group_ref.description: ID of the pool group to serve the request. It is a reference to an object of type PoolGroup. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

rules.description: Rules to apply when a new transport connection is setup. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

l4_connection_policy.description: Policy to apply when a new transport connection is setup. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

uuid.description: ID of the L4 Policy Set. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

name.description: Name of the L4 Policy Set. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

protocol.description: Transport protocol to match. Enum options - PROTOCOL_ICMP, PROTOCOL_TCP, PROTOCOL_UDP. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for transport protocol matching. Enum options - IS_IN, IS_NOT_IN. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

port_ranges.description: Range of TCP/UDP port numbers of the Virtual Service. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

ports.description: Virtual Service's listening port(s). Allowed values are 1-65535. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for Virtual Service port matching. Enum options - IS_IN, IS_NOT_IN. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

action.description: Action to be performed upon successful rule match. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

index.description: Index of the rule. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

enable.description: Enable or disable the rule. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

name.description: Name of the rule. Field introduced in 17.2.7.

match.description: Match criteria of the rule. Field introduced in 17.2.7.
